name: etl
description: Collection of stream-based components that form an ETL pipeline
author: Ziggy Jonsson (http://github.com/zjonsson/)

scripts.test: docker-compose -p etl up -d --no-recreate;docker exec -it etl_runner_1 bash ./test.sh
scripts.docker: docker-compose -p etl up -d --no-recreate;docker exec -it etl_runner_1 bash
